src:
이예원 등 노벨과학에세이 大賞
05 Nov 2019, 18:33 by 조선일보
입력 2019.11.06 03:33
한국과학기술한림원과 바른 과학기술사회 실현을 위한 국민연합이 주최한 제13회 노벨과학에세이대회에서 이예원(중대부고 2·물리학), 신재욱(서울과학고 1·화학), 임지현(창원성민여고 2·생리의학) 학생이 각 부문 대상을 받았다.
좋아요 0 Copyright ⓒ 조선일보 & Chosun.com 제휴안내구독신청
text:
Lee Won-won and other Nobel Science Essays
05 Nov 2019, 18:33 by Chosun Daily
Enter 2019.11.06 03:33
At the 13th Nobel Science Essay Contest organized by the Korea Academy of Science and Technology and the National Union for the Realization of a Good Science and Technology Society, Lee Ye-Won (Method 2, Physics), Shin Jae-Wook (Seoul Science High School 1, Chemistry), Lim Ji-Hyun (Changwon Sungmin High School 2 ·) Physiology) Students received the grand prize in each category.
